website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, affordably priced sock style from a trusted brand.
pros: Praised for being a great everyday sock, these are a good value for the cost
Customers also give them top marks for how breathable and durable they are
cons: A few felt they were scratchy or irritating, and some didn't like the lack of cotton
Occasional users experienced the heel slipping down

customer_reviews.title: NOT no-show
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn Hanes socks, so I knew as soon as I got these they would be too big, and definitely would not qualify as no-show. I have mostly "low cut" Hanes socks (they come up to just below the ankel), and wanted these for when I don't want any sock showing.... These ones come up higher than my low-cuts! They go over my ankle completely. And that's without stretching them at all. The size was definitely marked wrong or something, AND they are not the no-show cut 😔. I think I got a bad batch lol. Will be sending these back pronto.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn H. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I am the type that hates buying socks sight unseen because I like to look at them and feel them. I went out on a limb here and I'm glad I did! These are super comfortable socks! They are soft and supportive and sit right below the ankle. Cushion is great but not too much where it makes your feet feel sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: They crawl under your heel....constantly having to pull them up!
customer_reviews.text: The socks fit great but seem to ride a bit low. As I walk I find myself having to pull them back up further on my heel. If I don't pull them up they will crawl under my heel. I wear a size seven women's shoe so I don't think this should be happening. They are comfortable but it is really irritating to keep pulling them up.
customer_reviews.author: raquel

customer_reviews.title: Basic Black Ankle Sock
customer_reviews.text: These socks are pretty basic. Nothing particularly special about them. They’re reasonably priced, soft and comfortable. I wear them with sneakers to work out and shortie boots. They’re slightly visible in a standard sneaker and invisible in an average height fall bootie. They’re good quality and have yet to fade, though they’ve been washed several times. They’re plain black, and say Hanes in pink on the bottom near the toes. Pretty unremarkable, actually. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JEN A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands of no show black socks and I have to say that these are my new favorite. Excellent sock and good value for the price. Highly recommend. Pros: - nice amount of cushioning/padding - no weird seams that rub on your toes or ankles - elastic is just right - not too tight - does not collect lint/hair like my other black socks made with cheaper fabric blends - cotton is maintaining softness after many washes - truly breathable (not like the gross polyester kind) Cons: - the elastic was a little tight at first, but after a few wears it adjusted to my ankle
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but too warm for use in hot and humid weather.
customer_reviews.text: These are much thicker then I anticipated and they go up higher on my ankles so they don't look as sleek in tennis shoes or wick sweat away as I expected. They would probably work great in ankle boots for comfort and warmth because they are warm and plushy but I live in a hot and humid climate and bought this to be worn when working out or with my sneakers when working (rehab setting so I'm on my feet all day) and they arent my favorite because they're too thick and warm. Anyone who needs warmer basic socks would probably enjoy these but I wanted something to help keep my feet cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Lcichon12

customer_reviews.title: Fits numerous sizes great, will be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable socks I have ever had in my life. These are super soft and have a nice little thickness to them. I wear a size 7 1/2 in women's and they fit perfect. My to oldest daughter's wear 7s and they fit them great as well. In fact my 5 year old who wears about a 13 in kids (but has really wide feet) can even wear these with a perfect fit. Weird, but true. I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: momof4girls

customer_reviews.title: Slips off your heel
customer_reviews.text: These socks are super soft and feel nice, but unfortunately they tend to slip off my heel when wearing certain shoes. This is extremely annoying and I wouldn't have bought these if I'd known this. Granted I do have some shoes they don't do this with so much and the additional cushioning is appreciated. These are a bit thicker than most socks and are cozy so they're good for keeping your feet warm. Overall though the slipping off the heel is a deal breaker for me and so I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: A touch of pink in my all black wardrobe lol
customer_reviews.text: I actually love these socks. I'm pretty picky and these are great in my opinion. Little to no ankle gouging, the size fits comfortably (not too small/big), I love the way the bottoms of the sock are a tad thicker than the tops for comfort and breathability and the small hanes logo in blush pink made me so happy! A touch of pink in my all black wardrobe lol I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jess + Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As a prime member this one was the first item to disappoint me... Even after reading the reviews I purchased these socks. Not even 1 week and they all started getting holes on the bottom and some on the top. They are extremely comfy and soft, but they DO NOT LAST... the worse part is that I’ve actually had my other Hanes socks I bought in Target for years.... I wanted to get new ones since it’s been a while, but I was truly disappointed. I had to throw half of them away already.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana_

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh, these are the softest socks on the planet.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are soft as heck! I ordered another package in more colors as soon as I tried them on. I'm normally barefoot 24/7, and if I wear socks I end up kicking them off within fifteen minutes... I HATE socks... but I couldn't stop sliding around the house in these and telling my husband how plush and comfortable they were! He insists the plushness will eventually wear out, but I don't care, I will just buy more when that happens! I've never had socks this comfortable! I wear a size 7.5-8 in women's shoes and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp! Heaven! Now!

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some others, I need matching socks. It's annoying. Anyways... These socks always keep my feet comfy and dry, and last long enough for the price point. I order a pack or two every 6-9mo, but I also walk all over the city. Try them out and I highly doubt you'll regret it. Just make sure to wash them inside-out on the first wash/dry. Otherwise you'll get a fuzzy lovin' that may frighten you because it looks like an "OH F^©&" type of situation to the non-discerning eye. Or so I hear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay Hanes
customer_reviews.text: Needed black socks to go with black shoes, etc. You know haha. I overall really like this. Hanes is a great brand. They show on a little higher on my ankle than I expected, but it's no big deal really. The only thing I noticed though was that after only one wear, the bottom is not as "smooth" but has little pieces sticking out. It's hard to describe. It's almost like shedding? Sorry for my lack of words at the moment, just wanted to give the heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These socks are GREAT! They are not "no show" but I already ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks are GREAT! They are not "no show" but I already knew this when I bought them. The socks come up to the ankles. I wear them everyday to work out and they look great with my workout shoes. I am in the process of becoming a minimalist, so I threw away all of my other socks and just kept these (I purchased the 6 pack of all black socks). Very happy with the quality of the socks, not too thin and not too thick. They are comfy. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: AnileyR

customer_reviews.title: Nice Socks But Not Cotton - Mystery Material
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE: I did love these until I bought my last set. Not cotton. Materials unknown, not even included in packaging. Bummed. Returned. The description seems a bit misleading. I downgraded to a C because if poly is your thing, these are very thick and comfy socks. I love these socks. They are a cotton blend, so they breathe. They was pretty well. This is my third order. Not because the others were lost or had holes. It’s because my teens keep taking them. They’re a nice thickness. They stay up well.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Medium Cushion
customer_reviews.text: For cheap socks, these are pretty nice. They have more cushion on the bottom, but I've definitely had cushier (like my ralph lauren socks I just bought). I would say they are medium cushioned on the bottom, but they are comfortable. Fit is as expected. They are well made and seem like they will hold up for at least a year (I'm hoping, my previous Hanes socks have done so). There is extra cushion in the toe to avoid your toe poking through the top. Overall, for the price, I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NeuroGirl1515

customer_reviews.title: Super soft. Super low pro. Will not show even on chucks.
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy who wears these. I can't stand socks that show and these are as low cut as possible. With staying on your heel and not rolling down. Super soft and very long lasting. Machine wash. Have purchased these a few times to restock because my washer keeps eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Layze

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay Ankle Socks
customer_reviews.text: I like these ankle socks, however, they're a little loose on me. They fit comfortably but definitely aren't tight on my size 5.5 feet. They're soft and thick but after a couple washes it seems to lose its quality fairly quickly. I like them but I probably will be buying a different brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: amandatrizzyTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Not cotton!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Not exactly the best combination for wicking away sweat. Not sure why they're being advertised as cotton blend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G. Dugay

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks of black low cut socks!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, I don't feel like they will slip at all. The perfect softness. They're not too thick or thin. Best socks I have had in a while and I don't normally review things but I base a lot of my purchases on reviews so I like these enough to want to comment!
customer_reviews.author: Amariismom

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite everyday socks. They are so soft and have the right amount of thickness where it isn’t too much or too thin either. The ankle comes up high enough to protect my skin from rubbing on most shoes. Would recommend them as a good affordable sock.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: Shopped around: these are the best
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality considering how inexpensive these are, but I'm so happy with my purchase! I've had socks in the past that were really bulky and these are not like that at all. They are the perfect combination of being soft and sturdy. I wear a size 8 shoe and these fit perfectly, but I imagine that these would also fit great if you had larger or smaller feet. I got these because I'm trying to replace all of my old socks, and black is my favorite color to wear. I love when online shopping works out!
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable things I've ever put on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be ordering the socks again in the future. They are the most comfortable things I've ever put on my feet. I never really used to buy black socks, because my husband always had black socks, but these have a pink logo on the bottom of them. I absolutely love them! And for the price it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Ok sock but not a cotton/poly blend
customer_reviews.text: An ok sock but not as advertised as a cotton/poly blend. Mosty polyester. They are soft and fit my foot well. But I have clammy feet and without any cotton it makes for very cold feet. If you don't mind 100% poly then I'd say these are good sock. Otherwise look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ret Chief Wife

customer_reviews.title: Durable socks!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in 2016 and as of now I use it for Nike's, work shoes, boots or dressy shoes. It's great for long walks, hiking or any other activity. My feet are flat and I have one foot bigger than the other. With my situation, I had no issues with the socks at al!!! However on hot days, it does get my feet hot so I just switch to thin socks to avoid sweaty feet during the day. Either way, its shown no wear or tear for past few months and looks good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: No cotton are in these at all
customer_reviews.text: I got some thing completely different than the picture, 99% polyester and this is false advertising. And to me they say hanes , but I wonder about that too now. Disappointing, sending them back
customer_reviews.author: Doty15

customer_reviews.title: Comfy - Great Price - Good for Rockin the Crossfit Look
customer_reviews.text: First, I love that I have 6 pairs of comfy black socks that are all the same style. It makes me nuts when the styles in a pack are slightly different. Undoubtly, one or two socks will go missing. Worst case is that I'll have 1 sock missing a mate - not 3 or 5. The socks are comfortable - great for training sneakers and rocking the Crossfit look. The price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite socks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly they're not No Show socks. They go up to just below the ankle bone, on me anyways. I'm a size 7 so I ordered the appropriate size. They're super soft and the perfect thickness. I also noticed that my feet don't sweat as much as I thought they would in cotton socks, so that's a pleasant surprise. This is now my second set! The only socks that don't slip down my foot in boots. Never have to adjust them because they stay in place all dayyyy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Socks
customer_reviews.text: The socks themselves were just OK but they did not send me the correct sucks that I had ordered that were in the picture on the app so unfortunately I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Angela Olivestone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cushioned well
customer_reviews.text: These are very cushy and comfortable. They have been used and abused (walking in just socks outside) for several months and still look brand new. The color is staying perfectly and a wash restores any cushioning. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: JennU

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They were made really well and fit comfortably. One sock wore a hole in the top but other than that they all seem like new after each wash and I’ve had them for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Nelson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Soft and thick, these socks fit perfectly and also hold up to my terrible habit of wandering around outside in stocking feet from time to time. Love them and will buy again when I need more socks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything about the "Assorted 3" that I ordered because that is not what I received,I ended up with the "Grey/Blue" instead some how,I'm not mad because these are super soft and comfortable but that being said they did pill some after the first wash,I just wanted to warn anyone getting the Grey/Blue ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: They are socks!
customer_reviews.text: Just grabbed these on here because I couldn't get to the store. I like that when I am wearing my boots they don't fall under the heal. Overall, great socks!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: NOT no-show, but thick and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely NOT no-show socks. They come to a little above the ankle and I was going to return these except that I needed them for a trip. However, when I started wearing them I definitely began to appreciate the thickness, warmth, and comfort of these socks. I like them, even though they are not as advertised and are not no-show socks but instead are ankle socks
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Best socks ever
customer_reviews.text: Best socks ever! I can wear them with my boots, booties or whatever. they end right about where my leggings begin too, so there's no overlap and only a little gap. The only bummer, which I can't see how they could avoid, is that a slip on bootie will pull your sock off. Someday, by some miracle, someone will figure out how to avoid that and still give us low/no-show socks. Until then, these are the best I've found!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Overall good sock, but a tad bigger for small feet
customer_reviews.text: slightly larger than expected for the size range. The quality is good, they are soft and more cushioned than expected. I am hoping to have them shrink a bit in the wash, as I am a size 6.5 and purchased the smallest size, which are still a tad big.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Favorite workout socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! They're really soft and have a slightly padded base, which makes them very comfortable. They've proven durable so far. When I need new socks, I'll be ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable! I wear size 6 shoe and the sizing ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable! I wear size 6 shoe and the sizing guide is accurate. I haven’t worn them long so not sure if the socks will get holes but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Monika V.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are soft, comfortable, and yet very durable. I have had the same socks now for a year and they still have no holes in them and look barely worn.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and doesn't slip
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy and soft socks, but they stay in place when wearing shoes; they don't slip down your heel and get wadded up in your shoes, which is really all that I ask of ankle socks! Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: These socks were much smaller than stated. The elastic around the ankle was very tight and left red marks that took hours to go away. The worst part was that the toes were so tight they gave me ingrown toenails on my big toes.
customer_reviews.author: JS90

customer_reviews.title: I got these socks because they said that the fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these socks because they said that the fabric has 60% cotton and 40 % polyster but they ended up 99% polyster 😔
customer_reviews.author: AMINA JABRI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable, soft, and fit perfectly, I am a size 8-9! I was looking for some ankle socks that would keep my toes warm as it has been unusually cold lately, even for the Northeast! These socks have just enough thickness without being heavy, the elastic top does not dig into my skin, and it does not slip down, these socks are absolutely some of my faves I've bought, they are just exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: KweenOfNoize214

customer_reviews.title: Great socks but they develop  pills in the first 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Would not re-order. Develop pilling in the first 3 weeks - now have to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Don

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality socks! Fit was great, I purchased the 5-9 size and I wear a size 9. I like my socks to fit snug and not have a ton of extra material bunching around the ankles. Socks are super soft and have lasted great thought several wears and washings!
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: wonderful socks
customer_reviews.text: Just the right amount of thickness. My socks look good and feel great. The quality is also pretty good, they look like they will last a while and probably will not rip anytime soon. I love them and will purchase more of these. I bought the size "shoe 5-9" and I am a 6.5 in women shoes and these fitted me just right. I though they might be too big but they fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: **edit** Actually no-show!
customer_reviews.text: **Edit: Changed my rating down to three stars bc the ComfortBlend isn’t really all that comfortable. The material doesn’t breathe Exactly as described. I’m size 8.5 and they fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.author: SayHi fam

customer_reviews.title: NO FLOPPY SOCKS!
customer_reviews.text: One thing I hate about socks is that after a few washes they have lost their elasticity... these do not fall into that category. I love the socks! They are my new favorite simple stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best no show socks
customer_reviews.text: With size 10 feet and long toes, I’ve never loved any athletic sock But these are amazing and they prevent my feet from sweating in even 95+ degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Seriousshopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks!
customer_reviews.text: I like these soft, cushy socks. They're very comfortable and plush on the bottoms and are designed somewhat like a sport sock, with more padding on the bottom and thinner on top. I had expected just plain old thin cotton socks, which would've been fine, but these exceeded my expectations. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: I love the thickness of these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love the thickness of these socks. I am on my feet all day so that is important to provide extra comfort. The only thing I don't like is the elastic that goes around your ankle. I have small ankles and by the end of the day it is irritating. I can't say it leaves a mark because it is too tight. It is just something I can't pinpoint as to why it causes discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfy black socks. They do fade a little after washing them, but so do all cotton socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Thick, High Quality Socks
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Hanes products- I feel like the quality is always what I would expect. These are no exception. They're thick, but not too thick, and they're really soft and comfy. I put buying off socks for longer than I should, so these made for a great replacement. I think they'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and thick every day socks
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and thick every day socks. Feels like putting on a mitten for your feet. I will warn you, they are a bit on the thick side for your shoes so wear them with half size bigger boots like winter socks. Definitely far better value for the price compared to K.Bell cotton socks, which tear holes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality, I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wear these all the time around the house and it has taken them about 6 months to wear out. The elastic around the ankle gets a little loose after many runs through the washing machine, but not too bad. They are very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit me really well. They are comfortable, just thick enough. They hold up pretty well with a few loose threads here and there. Have bought 2 packs so far and plan to buy more. I didn't upload pictures because it's just socks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: This was a reorder from a year ago. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder from a year ago. The reorder is not the same quality as the 1st order. Very thin...very short. Caused blisters due to the fit. DEFINITELY NOT THE SAME SOCK! Much cheaper version. Will not reorder
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Size on the package did not match the actually sock size
customer_reviews.text: The socks that i received said “no show” size 5-9 but did not fit as no-show size 5-9. These fit like a size 8-12. I can’t wear them with sneakers because the heel part of the sock is higher then the back of my shoe. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Just right for working out
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality and comfort of these socks. I work out every morning and these have been washed now multiple times. They're just the right thickness with no slip with my sneakers. They don't make my feet hot (even on super humid days). I wear a size 8 and the fit was fine.
customer_reviews.author: vvvv

customer_reviews.title: Great sock, great fit
customer_reviews.text: I just received these socks and love them. They are just the right thickness for my sneakers, and are genuinely "no shows". I wear a 7-1/2 shoe and find it hard to find no show socks that aren't too big. These looked like they would have that problem until I washed them, then they were perfect. I will definitely buy these again!!!
customer_reviews.author: KathyD

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a whim before vacation and hated them. I didn't know it was possible to hate socks? They're way too thick and wear out easily
customer_reviews.author: CMFlis

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I waited so long to buy these socks, I had been buying cheap thin socks and when I put these on I was in love. They're plush, soft and durable. My feet are so comfortable in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly Berdine

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these basic black socks. They do show a little bit on the ankle but this is my second round of buying them.
customer_reviews.author: TMP1103

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit. I wear a 6 1/2 medium shoe and the 5 to 9 size is perfect. Comfortable sock.
customer_reviews.author: As I see it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect. They are thicker than most socks which I love. They have held up great after several washes. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I got these at a bargain price as a gift for my Wife. Her and I have been wearing Hanes for years and there products always seem to last.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Hoped
customer_reviews.text: These are very high for "no show" socks. They are fine with a high ankle sport shoes. Don't buy them to wear with a shoe that does not cover your ankles. They look awful with @keds.
customer_reviews.author: E O.

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the right color, but that's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white/pink ones and got black! This actually made me laugh. Even the packing slip says Hanes white/pink, then below that it says color black. Like what?! So beware you may not get what you ordered. But I'm fine with the black ones and will keep.
customer_reviews.author: MONICA S.

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so cushy and comfortable that it kind of took me by surprise. The price doesn’t match the quality at all, but for once in a good way. They fit perfectly and are super durable.
customer_reviews.author: ANHW

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy and they don't leave a bunch of lint on my feet when I take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: my favorite socks!
customer_reviews.text: i'm slowly replacing all of my socks with these... they are amazing! i've never found socks in store that I love this much and I am so happy I found these! have had them for several months now and have yet to had one rip.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Y

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks, they are so soft. Will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I was second guessing ordering "no show" socks because I was afraid it would end up slipping away like it happened with other brands in the past, but these have really good quality for the price, couldn't be more happy with the product! My shoe size is 8 and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Texas K.

customer_reviews.title: Great. Only thing I didn't realize is that there ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. Only thing I didn't realize is that there is a Hanes logo in pink at the bottom of the toes part of the sock. Doesn't matter to me, but for those looking for completely black socks/logo-less socks, not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: AmznFam

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only socks I wear because they don’t move..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The elastic at the top is very tight. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The elastic at the top is very tight. I have small ankles and they leave marks and hurt after a few hours. I tried to cut the top open to remove the elastic, but it is fused to the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cooper

customer_reviews.title: they don't make my feet sweat and they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Hanes, they don't make my feet sweat and they are comfortable. Being in the military we have to wear socks with no logos, very hard to find nowadays. The Hanes logo is on the bottom of the sock, if I have to I'll just marker it out. The Comfortblend does cover the ankle. They last a long time, once the toe and seam part start to get hard or stiff, it's time to change them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Drives me mad. I wanted short but this is insane. I had to discard all.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Size 7 women's shoe, snug but good fit
customer_reviews.text: Well made, not thin and cheap like others. I have one ankle slightly swollen, fits a bit snug there, the other foot I barely notice. Will not slip down. I wear a size 7 women's shoe and they are a bit snug in the toes, but once they stretch out so be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft and keep feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! They are not as thick as I was led to believe by other reviews. They're not too thin nor too thick! My feet slide in easily to my shoes when wearing the socks. And they do not fall down into the shoe when walking! They stay right at the ankle as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a year and wear them almost every day. They are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, just the right amount of cushion, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfortable. They aren't too thin but are not too thick either, they're slightly cushioned and seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. They are comfortable and a little on the thick side so hopefully that means they will last longer as I have a habit of wearing out my socks fast.
customer_reviews.author: christine spencer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Wore one time and had holes in them ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Wore one time and had holes in them by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Not too thin, comfortable. They do wear a bit after a short while wearing them with my tennis shoes. Good for price.
customer_reviews.author: R&ZOREILLY

customer_reviews.title: NO cotton there!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks because of this description 61% Cotton, 35% Polyester, 2% Rubber, 1% Nylon, 1% Spandex but when I got them it says 99% polyester 1% spandex.
customer_reviews.author: SAG

customer_reviews.title: 6 pairs for the price is a good deal. The socks also feel like cotton even ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well-constructed, no-show sock, soft and solid. 6 pairs for the price is a good deal. The socks also feel like cotton even though they are a blend.
customer_reviews.author: Book_Fan

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4 packs of socks because we have 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 packs of socks because we have 4 girls in the house. These socks are less than a month old and I have already had to throw out at least 12 socks because of holes in toe. Very poorly made and really wish I could get my money back on these. Very frustrating. :(
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and soft. One sock has a hole in the toe. Nowhere near ware attached
customer_reviews.author: Michellejacks

customer_reviews.title: Great basic sock
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Not too thick or thin. Good quality and great as a basic sock!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mattsen

customer_reviews.title: "No-show" socks that show!
customer_reviews.text: These socks were supposed to be "no show" socks. They come several inches above my shoes. They are nice and soft, but not "no show"!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lee

customer_reviews.title: OK athletic socks
customer_reviews.text: Good socks but I ordered them at the same time as another brand which were much better. These are a little tight around the ankle area, however it's not painful or anything. They're better than others I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline.Pea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft, great fit for my size 8 feet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, soft, and I have not had any trouble with the heel slipping. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Martina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these socks. Super thick and comfortable. I bought them a year ago and they’re still in great condition and I wear them EVERY DAY. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: DisneyBeans

customer_reviews.title: Comfy socks
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I'd call these 'no show', but they are perfect for what I wear them with. I'm just wearing them with black sneakers, but need something comfy because I have a lot of foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: VL Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Thick and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit well and are a high quality product. They are thick and comfy. They're very soft on the inside. They are snug enough to not fall down (nobody likes a lazy sock).
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The socks are so soft and comfy! I've bought them 2x times now.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Starting pilling after the first wash
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, very soft, but starting pilling after the first wash. Really comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Milosch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great fit. Many ankle fit socks sometimes fall into shoes during walking/running; but these are not!
customer_reviews.author: Cosme Gal

product_meta.title: Hanes Women's ComfortBlend
product_meta.description: Looking for softness and cushioning in a no-show sock we've got what you want. And then some.
feature_bullets: Compact cushioning gives you all the comfort without all the bulkiness
Breathable cotton blended with spandex for a better fit.
Wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry
Extra-durable, long-lasting heel and toe areas
Comfort toe seaming, our most comfortable seam ever
